title: Snap Hutao Data Export Tool
description: This tool runs entirely locally and does not upload any data to the server.
display_lang_tip: Except for Simplified Chinese, all translations are AI-generated. Feedback welcome.
choose_file_description_1_start: This file is located in the data directory set when initializing Snap Hutao, usually in the
choose_file_description_2_username_tip: Replace with your own Windows username
download_description: Download will start automatically, please check your browser's download list.
export_gacha_data_lang_description: Other languages only convert item names, effectiveness not guaranteed. Feedback welcome for improvement.
other_export_description_1: Spiral Abyss, Imaginarium Theater and Stygian Onslaught data development is temporarily suspended due to lack of unified standards.
other_export_description_2: Wish records and Spiral Abyss, Imaginarium Theater and Stygian Onslaught data can be exported to Starward launcher using the tool below.
